title: Bay Wrap
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers several vegetarian wraps on menu which can also be made vegan by asking for no cheese or yogurt sauce. Other dishes can also be made vegan. All ingredients are listed on menu. Staff is happy to add/omit ingredients by request as every wrap is made fresh to order. Has soy milk for coffee and lattes. Also serves salads and a rice, tofu and bean wrap for under $5. Limited seating indoors and a couple picnic tables outdoors.
